definitions.title: n. pr. gent. pl.
definitions.body: the Susians, people of Susa Ezr 4:9, v. [[דהוא]] (Dl:Pa 327; sg. [[[שׁוּשַׁנׇךְ]]] acc. to Scheft:92, = OP * šušana-ka, from Susa, so (as altern.) Andr:M 85 *; cf. (on Elam. god Šušinak) Weissbach:Anzanische Inschr. 136 Jen:VOJ vi. 54 Zim:KAT 3. 485, and (on Šušunḳa in Elam. inscr., appar. n.pr.terr.) v. Weissb:1. c. Jen:ZMG iv (1901), 229).
